data.quote: I love language, and I love the failure of language.

data.quote: The U.S. has a law on the books called the debt limit, but the name is misleading. The debt limit started in 1917 for the purpose of facilitating more national debt, not reducing it. It still serves that purpose. It's unconnected to spending, hurts our credit rating and has been an abject failure at limiting debt.
data.author: David Malpass

data.quote: Catastrophes are often stimulated by the failure to feel the emergence of a domain, and so what cannot be felt in the imagination is experienced as embodied sensation in the catastrophe.

data.quote: I couldn't stand the thought of not succeeding failure was more than I could deal with.

data.quote: What we have most to fear is failure of the heart.

data.quote: I'm fascinated by failure, and I'm fascinated by finality. Shakespeare's historical plays are more universal than his comedies because they relate to the finality of life. Without finality, life would not be beautiful.

data.quote: Entrepreneurs are risk takers, willing to roll the dice with their money or reputation on the line in support of an idea or enterprise. They willingly assume responsibility for the success or failure of a venture and are answerable for all its facets.

data.quote: Losing is no disgrace if you've given your best.

data.quote: Any man who has $10,000 left when he dies is a failure.

data.quote: I've criticized President Bush for his failure to use his veto pen. There's plenty of blame to go around. The question is how to solve problems. It's not bailouts. What made America great? Free markets, free enterprise, manufacturing, job creation. That's how we're gonna do it, not by enlarging government.

data.quote: Divorce is never a pleasant experience. You look upon it as a failure. But I learned to be a different person once we broke up. Sometimes you learn more from failure than you do from success.

data.quote: Spend enough time around success and failure, and you learn a reverence for possibility.

data.quote: Success and failure are greatly overrated. But failure gives you a whole lot more to talk about.

data.quote: Most social acts have to be understood in their setting and lose meaning if isolated... No error in thinking about social facts is more serious than the failure to see their place and function.

data.quote: Love yourself. It is important to stay positive because beauty comes from the inside out.

data.quote: Success is no accident. It is hard work, perseverance, learning, studying, sacrifice and most of all, love of what you are doing or learning to do.

data.quote: Friends show their love in times of trouble, not in happiness.

data.quote: Love myself I do. Not everything, but I love the good as well as the bad. I love my crazy lifestyle, and I love my hard discipline. I am proud of everything that I am and will become.

data.quote: Immature love says: 'I love you because I need you.' Mature love says 'I need you because I love you.'

data.quote: Love is friendship that has caught fire. It is quiet understanding, mutual confidence, sharing and forgiving. It is loyalty through good and bad times. It settles for less than perfection and makes allowances for human weaknesses.

data.quote: Sometimes the heart sees what is invisible to the eye.
data.author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

data.quote: There is no love without forgiveness, and there is no forgiveness without love.

data.quote: Peace is the beauty of life. It is sunshine. It is the smile of a child, the love of a mother, the joy of a father, the togetherness of a family. It is the advancement of man, the victory of a just cause, the triumph of truth.

data.quote: Nobody can predict the future. You just have to give your all to the relationship you're in and do your best to take care of your partner, communicate and give them every last drop of love you have. I think one of the most important things in a relationship is caring for your significant other through good times and bad.

data.quote: Choose a job you love, and you will never have to work a day in your life.

data.quote: Did I offer peace today? Did I bring a smile to someone's face? Did I say words of healing? Did I let go of my anger and resentment? Did I forgive? Did I love? data.quote: Love will find a way through paths where wolves fear to prey.

data.quote: I see Americans of every party, every background, every faith who believe that we are stronger together: black, white, Latino, Asian, Native American; young, old; gay, straight; men, women, folks with disabilities, all pledging allegiance under the same proud flag to this big, bold country that we love. That's what I see. That's the America I know!
data.author: Barack Obama

data.quote: Lord, make me an instrument of thy peace. Where there is hatred, let me sow love.

data.quote: Love looks not with the eyes, but with the mind, And therefore is winged Cupid painted blind.
